title: Their Partners Were Cheating While They Were On Vacation?!
description:
Social media has been infamous for getting people in trouble. Direct messages, comments, and even likes have been known to cause rifts in relationships. But what do you do when your something you’ve posted pisses someone off?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
